member.name: T:HyperVAdmin.Attributes.AJAXOnlyAttribute
member.summary: Custom attribute to decorate functions with. Only allows AJAX requests on actions decorated with [AJAXOnly].

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Attributes.AJAXOnlyAttribute.IsValidForRequest(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.Reflection.MethodInfo)
member.summary: Check whether the request is an AJAX request or not/
member.returns: Boolean indicating if current request is an AJAX request

member.name: T:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.IndexController
member.summary: The homepage

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.IndexController.Index
member.summary: The default view for the root of the domain, showing both sites and VMs

member.name: T:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.SitesController
member.summary: Controller to manage all Sites related actions.

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.SitesController.Index
member.summary: Shows a list of all Sites and their related actions.

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.SitesController.GetSites
member.summary: Gets a JSON array with all Sites. Called by AJAX to refresh content.

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.SitesController.StopSite(System.String)
member.summary: Stops a site. Sitename is used to determine which site to stop.

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.SitesController.StartSite(System.String)
member.summary: Starts a site. Sitename is used to determine which site to start.

member.name: T:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.VMsController
member.summary: Controller to manage all VM related actions.

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.VMsController.Index
member.summary: Shows a list of all VMs and their related actions.

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.VMsController.GetVMs
member.summary: Gets a JSON array with all VMs. Called by AJAX to refresh content.
member.returns: A JSON array with all VMs.

member.name: M:HyperVAdmin.Controllers.VMsController.ToggleState(System.String,HyperVAdmin.Models.VirtualMachineState)
member.summary: Toggles the state of the VM. The vmName is used to target the VM and the state is used to set the state of the VM.
member.param: What VirtualMachineState to set the VM to.
member.returns: JSON with a string indiciating success of the action.

member.summary: The Model representing a site.

member.summary: Retrieves a list of SiteModels.

member.summary: The name of the Site.

member.summary: The fullpath of the site's location.

member.summary: The bindings of the Site.

member.name: P:HyperVAdmin.Models.SiteModel.State
member.summary: The current state of the Site, such as stopped, started etc.

member.summary: Gets a list of VirtualMachinesModels.

member.summary: Used to retrieve the VirtualMachineModel List by GetVMList.

member.summary: The name of the VM.

member.summary: The description of the VM.

member.summary: The total Virtual Memory available for this VM.

member.summary: The used memory of this VM. Currently not used.

member.name: P:HyperVAdmin.Models.VirtualMachineModel.MemoryAllocationUnits
member.summary: The units of virtual memory allocation as a string (such as MB).

member.summary: The current state of the VM. Such as start, stop etc.

member.name: P:HyperVAdmin.Models.VirtualMachineModel.CoresAmount
member.summary: The amounts of virtual cores associated with this VM.

member.name: P:HyperVAdmin.Models.VirtualMachineModel.MAC
member.summary: The MAC address of the virtual network switch adapter.

member.name: P:HyperVAdmin.Models.VirtualMachineModel.TimeOfLastStateChange
member.summary: The last time the VirtualMachineState was changed.

member.name: P:HyperVAdmin.Models.VirtualMachineModel.OnTimeInMilliseconds
member.summary: The time in ms inidicating how long the VM has been running. Will be 0 when off.

member.summary: A human readable string of the last time the VirtualMachineState was changed.

member.summary: A TimeSpan inidicating how long the VM has been running.

member.summary: A human readable represantation of the time the VM has been running.
